message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my product for $1250000. I believe this price reflects the value you'll get out of it while also being a fair deal for me. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and what I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1000000.  This reflects the significant value you'll gain from the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $1000000. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
